name: Chapter 13: Testing Time
short_description: The completed re-coding is put to the test as the cosmic event approaches. The crew and Codarians hold their breath while the algorithms are executed, awaiting the outcome.
people: Captain Picard, Data, Codarian leaders, Enterprise crew
from_prev_chapter: The completed code is ready to be tested against the cosmic event.
to_next_chapter: The initial results come in, determining if the disaster has been averted.
